channel.title: [PI] Making another Rank
channel.description:
Hello guys, well I tried to substitute de Donator's Rank to my own rank that is called, Beta Tester, but I don't know how to make it..., I got the mod crown color green...
What I want you to help me with... (if you can)...
Photo:
[IMG]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/Caldito/newrank.png[/img]
1. How to make Yell works and appears: [Beta Tester]Victim: Hello... 2. How to make the Donator botton works, and how to change that symbol... 3. And make Soul War's blue & red cape only wearable to admins, and Beta Tester, and change the name of it...
Thanks!

item.title: [PI] Making another Rank
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

About yell, I have this

Was:

}else if (c.isDonator == 1){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

Changed it to:

}else if (c.isBetaTester == 4){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Beta Tester]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

and this error appears:

And where do I get or I need to make the token (image)? or what you mean?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Making another Rank
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Search for ::yell in your commands.java, nuff said.

Botton… lol :P. You have to get the token of beta tester and search isDonor and replace that with the beta tester token.

I saw a tutorial for this not to long ago. Try looking in the tutorial section or look for the skill cape level reqs and just edit them to make it only work for the donor people.

Read full topic
